name: Mont-Thabor Armchair - Costes x Liaigre Capsule Collection
description: Ideal for living rooms or bedrooms, this spacious armchair encourages conversation. Completely clad in leather, it rests on a black-sanded ash base. Part of the Costes x Liaigre Capsule Collection, originally designed for the Costes Hotel in Paris, expressing the Parisian and cosmopolitan spirit of this 5-star address.
